user.title: Connect to Firewalla MSP
user.description:
Enter your Firewalla MSP subdomain (the part before .firewalla.net) and your personal access token.

Create a token under **Account Settings → Create New Token** in your MSP portal.

data_description.enable_flows: Creates a sensor for each recent traffic flow. Can generate a large number of entities.
data_description.enable_traffic: Adds download/upload byte counters per device.
data_description.enable_target_lists: Creates a sensor for each target list showing its entry count and contents.

select_boxes.title: Select Boxes
select_boxes.description: Choose which Firewalla boxes to monitor in Home Assistant. All boxes are selected by default.

data_description.box_filter: Deselect any boxes you do not want to appear in Home Assistant.

error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed - check your subdomain and API token.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to reach the Firewalla API. Check your network and subdomain.
